hero.title: The core that hosts every HB intelligence hub.
hero.subtitle: Under the HB Intellicore umbrella, each hub launches with governed data, unified identity and infrastructure ready to scale.

ecosystem.title: The umbrella platform
paragraphs: HB Intellicore is the backbone hosting every specialised hub and module. It concentrates data pipelines, governance, digital identity and AI infrastructure so every hub shares the same trusted baseline.
Clients activate the most urgent hub first and expand next, without rebuilding integrations or processes. Everything is born ready for reuse, auditing and joint evolution.
pills: Configurable hubs by sector or process
Shared roadmap aligned with founder clients

items.title: HB Agro Intel
items.description: First hub in the ecosystem, with regulatory and operational modules for agribusiness.

items.title: Upcoming hubs
items.description: Health, life sciences, sustainability and ESG are on the HB Intellicore roadmap and evolve with our client council.

agroPreview.title: HB Agro Intel spotlight
agroPreview.description: Our first live hub inside HB Intellicore, with its own identity and continuous evolution.
bullets: Module 2 (design stage) for producers and agronomists
Planned integrations: MAPA, ANVISA, IBAMA, ERPs and corporate SSO
agroPreview.cta: See HB Agro Intel in detail

cta.title: Activate or expand your hub inside HB Intellicore
cta.subtitle: We map priorities, integrations and initial modules together — always anchored on the same backbone.

manifest.title: Intelligence, legislation and technology connected
paragraphs: HB Advisory is a strategy and intelligence platform founded by Hudson Borges, an executive with over 20 years across environmental sciences, agrochemicals, biotechnology and applied research.
We turn public and private data into actionable direction, with auditable pipelines, living documentation and close collaboration with client teams.

founder.title: Hudson Borges
highlights: Veterinarian from University of Brasília with a Crop Protection specialisation (UniFeob)
International programs in Advanced Toxicology (University of Guelph) and Regulatory Science (SCAHT)
Leadership roles at Syngenta, Bayer, Envu and Bioagri (Mérieux NutriSciences) across Latin America
Multicultural experience in Switzerland, Germany, USA, Canada, France, the UK and Latin America
founder.quote: HB Advisory embodies the maturity of a vision: intelligence as the bridge connecting science, legislation and technology — transforming information into direction and innovation into impact.

about.mission: Integrate technical knowledge, data and technology to generate applied intelligence — connecting science, legislation and strategy to accelerate innovation.
about.vision: Become the Latin American reference in integrated intelligence, linking public, private and scientific systems to reshape innovation and compliance.

values.title: Technical excellence
values.description: Scientific and methodological rigour as a standard.

values.title: Integration
values.description: Data, people and institutions connected as a network.

values.title: Transparency & ethics
values.description: A solid foundation of credibility and purpose.

steps.title: Discovery
steps.description: Immersion into regulatory, technical and strategic challenges.

steps.title: Modeling
steps.description: Structuring data, workflows and key indicators.

steps.title: Integration
steps.description: Connecting corporate systems, public agencies and partners.

steps.title: Operation
steps.description: Governance, monitoring and continuous evolution with the teams.

careers.title: Careers & collaboration
careers.body: We are assembling a network of experts in regulation, data engineering, UX and growth. Interested in contributing to HB Intellicore or HB Agro Intel? Share your portfolio or product idea at talentos@hb-advisory.com.br.

hero.title: HB Intellicore
hero.subtitle: The central umbrella that connects data, automation and AI for every HB hub.

core.title: Backbone engineered for multiple hubs
core.description: Decoupled layers — data, rules, analytics and applications — let us launch new modules while keeping governance, performance and reusable integrations.

layers.title: Data
layers.description: Collection, normalization, versioning and a unified catalogue with shared metadata.

layers.title: Rules & legislation
layers.description: Requirements mapping, internal policies, corporate registers and orchestrated workflows.

layers.title: Analytics & AI
layers.description: Predictive models, copilots and business-oriented dashboards to speed up decisions.

layers.title: Applications
layers.description: Hubs, APIs and experiences tailored by sector with their own identity and roadmap.

connections.title: Core connections
items: Corporate infrastructure (ERP, BI, DMS, CRM, SSO)
Scientific, open and private data sources
Strategic partners and our founder client council
connections.note: All integrations are versioned, audited and monitored inside HB Intellicore.

security.title: Security & governance
principles: Role-based access aligned with corporate governance
Compliance with regulatory and internal requirements

cta.title: Ready to design the next hub inside HB Intellicore?

hero.title: HB Agro Intel
hero.subtitle: Intelligence software for agribusiness, built inside HB Intellicore.

identity.title: HB Agro Intel identity
description: Derived from the HB Advisory brand, highlighting the agro universe with green, beige, brown and gold tones.
We apply the new mark across the entire journey: web modules, commercial materials, living documentation and authenticated HB Intellicore areas.
identity.tagline: Palette inspired by fertile soil, precision technology and harvest season.
identity.note: Full identity guidelines (typography, raster assets and applications) are underway. Request early access with our team.

overview.title: What we deliver from day one
overview.description: HB Agro Intel combines regulatory automation, field operational intelligence and governance in a single hub.
items: Certified pipelines with MAPA, ANVISA, IBAMA and state agencies
Templates versioned by crop, product, classification and regulatory stage
Status dashboards, deadline alerts and real-time audit trails
Identity and SSO layer already integrated with HB Intellicore

video.title: Guided HB Agro Intel walkthrough
video.description: We are finalising the video walkthrough covering the main flows. Meanwhile, share your corporate email to receive the navigable prototype and join guided sessions.
video.note: The full video will be shared with founder clients and prioritised partners.
video.caption: Navigable prototype updated weekly

items.label: Module 1 – Regulatory
items.description: End-to-end flow for product and professional registration with dynamic checklists, timelines and auditable history.
features: Living requirements library by agency, crop and product
Dossier, evidence, attachment and version management
Status dashboards, deadline alerts and audit trails
Confirmed integrations with MAPA/Agrofit and ANVISA; IBAMA and state agencies next

items.label: Module 2 – Producer & Agronomist
items.description: Supports field teams with technical recommendations, compliance and operational monitoring.
features: Agronomic recommendation matrix and risk alerts
Integration with agribusiness ERPs, CRM and climate data
Mobile-first dashboards for agronomists, dealers and partners
Pilot program with founding clients starting 2026

items.title: Registration and post-registration
items.description: Orchestrates the full registration lifecycle for crop protection products with audit-ready history and proactive alerts.

items.title: Agronomist and producer management
items.description: Portal with technical recommendations, risk alerts and integrations with field ERPs and CRMs.

items.title: ESG governance & compliance
items.description: Traceability for inputs, reports and socio-environmental commitments connected to performance indicators.

steps.title: Collect & normalize
steps.description: Pipelines for MAPA, ANVISA, IBAMA, AgroAPI, Bioinsumos, DOU and private sources.

steps.title: Orchestrate
steps.description: Triggers and playbooks connecting regulatory, legal, corporate and agronomic teams.

steps.title: Decide
steps.description: Dashboards, reports and copilots that accelerate approvals, mitigate risks and prioritise field actions.

steps.title: Continuous learning
steps.description: Feedback loops with founder clients and a shared roadmap evolution.

integrations.title: Integrations & data sources
integrations.note: Every integration inherits monitoring, logging and versioning from HB Intellicore.

phases.label: Q4 2025
phases.description: Regulatory pilots with complete dossiers and MAPA / ANVISA integrations.

phases.label: Q1 2026
phases.description: Producer & Agronomist module with mobile app and climate alerts.

phases.label: Q2 2026
phases.description: ESG and sustainability layer with executive dashboards and indicators.
